name: Master of Corruption
description: Corruptions gain reduced recharge time and inflict additional conditions on you.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

prefix.description: <c=@abilitytype>Corruption. </c>Feast on your conditions, gaining health for each one consumed. You become vulnerable.

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

prefix.description: <c=@abilitytype>Corruption. </c>Bleed yourself to grant might to allies around you and bleed your target.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

prefix.description: <c=@abilitytype>Corruption.</c> Weaken yourself and envelope the target area in a noxious cloud that blocks enemy missiles and poisons foes and leaves them weakened.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

prefix.description: <c=@abilitytype>Corruption.</c> Poison yourself. Transform boons on your foe into negative conditions.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

prefix.description:
<c=@abilitytype>Corruption.</c> Apply vulnerability to yourself. Spread conditions on a target foe to all nearby foes at a reduced duration.
<c=@reminder>WvW only: does not affect structures or targets with resistance.</c>

facts.description: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.

prefix.description: <c=@abilitytype>Corruption.</c> Create a virulent cloud that inflicts conditions on foes in its area. This plague inflicts additional conditions every second it persists. Inflict bleeding on yourself.
